reauth_user_code.description:
The Tuya integration now uses an improved login method. To reauthenticate with your Smart Life or Tuya Smart account, you need to enter your user code.

You can find this code in the Smart Life app or Tuya Smart app in **Settings** > **Account and Security** screen, and enter the code shown on the **User Code** field. The user code is case sensitive, please be sure to enter it exactly as shown in the app.

user.description:
Enter your Smart Life or Tuya Smart user code.

You can find this code in the Smart Life app or Tuya Smart app in **Settings** > **Account and Security** screen, and enter the code shown on the **User Code** field. The user code is case sensitive, please be sure to enter it exactly as shown in the app.

scan.description:
Use Smart Life app or Tuya Smart app to scan the following QR-code to complete the login.

Continue to the next step once you have completed this step in the app.

ir_add_key.title: New IR key for {device_name}
ir_add_key.description: Enter the name of the new key, then press Submit then point your remote to the hub and hit the key on your remote

data_description.new_ir_key_human: The display text of the new key that will be added to the IR device.
data_description.new_ir_key_technical: The technical name of the new key that will be added to the IR device.

ir_add_device.title: New IR device under {device_name}
ir_add_device.description: Enter the name of the new device

service_deprecation_turn_off.title: Tuya vacuum support for vacuum.turn_off is being removed

confirm.title: Tuya vacuum support for vacuum.turn_off is being removed
confirm.description: Tuya vacuum support for the vacuum.turn_off service is deprecated and will be removed in Home Assistant 2024.2; Please adjust any automation or script that uses the service to instead call vacuum.stop and select submit below to mark this issue as resolved.

service_deprecation_turn_on.title: Tuya vacuum support for vacuum.turn_on is being removed

confirm.title: Tuya vacuum support for vacuum.turn_on is being removed
confirm.description: Tuya vacuum support for the vacuum.turn_on service is deprecated and will be removed in Home Assistant 2024.2; Please adjust any automation or script that uses the service to instead call vacuum.start and select submit below to mark this issue as resolved.

The integration "{name}" (`{config_entry_id}`) could not connect to the Tuya OpenAPI service (request failed)

To fix this error, check that your HA can access the internet and that there is no firewall in between HA and Tuya OpenAPI endpoints.
confirm.title: Tuya OpenAPI request failed

confirm.description:
The integration "{name}" (`{config_entry_id}`) could not connect to the Tuya OpenAPI service (credentials expired)

To fix this error please follow the guide at [this URL](https://github.com/azerty9971/xtend_tuya/blob/main/docs/renew_cloud_credentials.md), then restart Home Assistant.
confirm.title: Tuya OpenAPI credentials expired

confirm.description:
The integration "{name}" (`{config_entry_id}`) Does not have Tuya OpenAPI credentials

Without this, a lot of entities might be missing in your devices.

To fix this warning please follow the guide at [this URL](https://github.com/azerty9971/xtend_tuya/blob/main/docs/cloud_credentials.md), then restart Home Assistant.
confirm.title: Tuya OpenAPI account not configured

confirm.description:
The integration "{name}" (`{config_entry_id}`) Does not have a Tuya OpenAPI account that is subscribed to the Smart Lock Open Service

Without this, locks will not function properly.

To fix this warning please follow the guide at [this URL](https://github.com/azerty9971/xtend_tuya/blob/main/docs/configure_locks.md), then restart Home Assistant.
confirm.title: Tuya OpenAPI account badly configured (lock)

confirm.description:
The integration "{name}" (`{config_entry_id}`) Does not have a Tuya OpenAPI account that is subscribed to the IoT Video Live Stream service

Without this, cameras will not function properly.

To fix this warning please follow the guide at [this URL](https://github.com/azerty9971/xtend_tuya/blob/main/docs/configure_cameras.md), then restart Home Assistant.
confirm.title: Tuya OpenAPI account badly configured (camera)

confirm.description:
The integration "{name}" (`{config_entry_id}`) Does not have a Tuya OpenAPI account that is subscribed to the IR Control Hub Open Service service

Without this, IR devices will not function properly.

To fix this warning please follow the guide at [this URL](https://github.com/azerty9971/xtend_tuya/blob/main/docs/configure_ir.md), then restart Home Assistant.
confirm.title: Tuya OpenAPI account badly configured (IR)
